name: CLICK HERE FOR BRAZILIAN STRAIGHT BUNDLE DEALS!
description:
THE BUNDLE DEALS ARE LISTED BY THE LENGTHS. IF THERE ARE 3 LENGTHS LISTED THAT MEANS THAT DEAL IS FOR 3 BUNDLES

EXAMPLE - 12", 14", 16" - $230. YOU GET 3 BUNDLES (ONE 12" BUNDLE, ONE 14" BUNDLE AND ONE 16" BUNDLE) FOR $230!!!!!

***BUNDLE DEALS CAN NOT BE COMBINED WITH OUR REGULAR PROMOTION OF 10% OFF 3 BUNDLES OR MORE***

name: Virgin Brazilian Body Wave Single Bundles
description:
BUY 3 OR MORE SINGLE BUNDLES AND GET 10% OFF YOUR TOTAL PURCHASE! USE COUPON CODE: SAVE10 (Lace closures CANNOT be substituted as a bundle)

***Prices indicated are per (1) 3.5 oz bundle. 3 Bundles are recommended for a full install***

Our Virgin Brazilian Body Wave hair is very soft and bouncy! Beautiful waves from weft to tip. Extremely versatile and can be worn in its natural state and can also be straightened or curled. It will revert back to its natural state when washed. 3 bundles are recommended for a full install.

.Hair type - 100% Virgin Human Hair 

·Color - Natural Brown/Black

·Texture - Soft 

·Weft – Machine weft

·Approx. Weight - 3.5 oz

.Luster - Low to Medium 

·Lengths Available – 12” -  30''

name: Virgin Brazilian Straight Single Bundles
description:
BUY 3 OR MORE SINGLE BUNDLES AND GET 10% OFF YOUR TOTAL PURCHASE! USE COUPON CODE: SAVE10 (Lace Closures CANNOT be substituted as a bundle)

***Prices indicated are per (1) 3.5 oz bundle. 3 Bundles are recommended for a full install***

Our Virgin Brazilian Straight hair is silky soft to the touch! Blends very well with all hair types. This hair is very versatile! It can be worn in its natural state and also holds beautiful curls. It will revert back to its natural state when washed. 

.Hair type - 100% Virgin Human Hair 

·Color - Natural Brown/Black

·Texture - Silky Soft

·Weft – Machine weft

·Approx. Weight  - 3.5 oz

·Lengths Available – 12” -  30''

name: Virgin Brazilian Straight Lace Closure
description:
****SALE****

WAS $120-$130 NOW LACE CLOSURES ARE ONLY $80! NOW THRU 12.25.13! THIS SALE CAN NOT BE COMBINED WITH OUR REGULAR PROMOTION OF 10% OFF 3 BUNDLES OR MORE!

Free parting virgin Brazilian straight Lace closure! Silky Soft Straight Brazilian closure can be curled to match any hair texture or worn straight in its natural state. Holds beautiful curls and can be dyed any color that you desire. Get a realistic, undetectable look with this closure!

·Hair type - 100% Virgin Human Hair 

·Dimensions - 4" x 4"

·Lace Color - Medium Brown 

·Hair Color - Natural Brown/Black

·Texture - Soft

·Density - 120%

·Lengths Available – 12” - 16''

name: OMBRE', HIGHLIGHTS AND FULL COLOR SERVICE {HAIR SOLD SEPARATELY}
description:
We offer Ombre, full color and highlighting treatments to all of our customers!

How it works: Add this service option to your cart along with your hair purchase. Once your purchase is complete, send us a message in the contact section letting us know what color Ombre, highlights or full color you want! You can even email us pictures of your inspired look! info@HassadityHair.com

**Highlights are $15 per Bundle**

**Ombre is $20 per Bundle**

**Full color is $25 per Bundle**

name: CUSTOM WIG SERVICE {HAIR SOLD SEPARATELY}
description:
We make custom Wigs! It's to easy wear, natural looking and undetectable!

How it works: Custom wigs are made to order. $125 is the cost for the Wig SERVICE ONLY; you must purchase the hair separately. Wigs can be made from any of the hair textures we offer in any length. 

You must purchase a lace closure and at least 3 bundles to utilize this service. Once we've received your payment and order details, we will begin making your custom Wig. No added shipping time is necessary!

**Email info@Hassadityhair.com with your head measurements: ear to ear, forehead to nape and circumference**

**If you would like for your wefts to be sealed, please add the Custom Wig w/ Weft Seal option**  There is an additional $20 Service fee to seal the wefts**

name: U-PART WIG SERVICE {HAIR SOLD SEPARATELY}
description:
We make U-PART wigs! It's a great alternative to sew ins. It's easy to install, natural looking and undetectable!

How it works: The U-part wigs are made to order. $75 is the cost for the service only; you must purchase the hair separately. It can be made from any of the hair textures we offer in any length. You must purchase at least 3 bundles in order to purchase this service. Once we've received your payment and order details, we will begin making your custom U-part wig. No added shipping time is necessary!

**If you would like for your wefts to be sealed, please add the U-Part Wig + Weft Seal option**  There is an additional $20 Service fee to seal the wefts

options.name: U-Part Wig w/ Weft Sealing Service

name: LAYAWAY OPTION
description:
There is a $50 minimum down payment for layaway. There is an additional $15 processing fee for layaway which will be calculated in your total amount. You are allowed to make a total of 4 payments maximum. 

Make your first payment here by adding the layaway option to your order. When checking out in Paypal, please indicate your order details in the notes to seller section. We will email you back to verify your order details. 

For more details on the Layaway Option, please click on the Layaway Option tab at the bottom of the page.

name: CLIP IN SERVICE {HAIR SOLD SEPARATELY}
description:
How it works: Clip in extensions are made to order. It can be made out of any hair texture in any length. The listed price is the cost for the service only; You must purchase the hair separately.

****1 set for a natural look, 2 sets for a voluminous look*****

*Each 8 pc. set includes: 

(3 pcs.) 7 1/2" wide 
(2 pcs.) 5 1/2" wide 
(2 pcs.) 4 1/4" wide 
(1 pcs.) 2 1/4" wide 

*$20 Discount is applied if you purchase 2 sets of clip ins*

name: Texture Sample
description: Not sure which texture is right for you? Order a sample before you make your investment! Now offering samples of our Virgin Brazilian Body Wave, Virgin Brazilian Straight and Virgin Malaysian Body Wave hair

name: Spandex Dome Cap
description:
Spandex Dome Caps are used to make wigs and U-part wigs. This cap is thick and durable allowing your unit to remain in tack for long periods of time. This cap features an elastic band around the perimeter which allows a secure and comfortable fit!

Product Description

One size fits all
Stretchable
Superior Quality
Smooth Finish
100% Spandex
Wrinkle Free
Deluxe Material

**$5.95 Domestic Shipping fee when shipped alone**

name: Dritz® Fray Check
description:
Dritz® Fray Check Fabric Sealant is used on wefts to help prevent shedding. Save yourself some time by purchasing your Fray check here along with your hair purchase!

Product Description:

Brand: Dritz®
Collection: Fray Check
Dimensions: 0.75 oz
Color: Clear 

**$5.95 Shipping fee when shipped alone**

name: Express Shipping - US ONLY
description:
***P L E A S E        R E A D***

The charge for express shipping is $35. $29.05 will be added when you add this option to your cart. The remaining balance of $5.95 will be added at checkout when you choose your country destination. 
This service is reserved for US ORDERS ONLY.

You will receive your order within 3-4 business days of your order date.

If you have any questions, please send us a message in the contact section and someone will get back to you ASAP!
